column4: and another question.. how to edit a binary file in hex format? any hex editors? can the command hex do that? :)
thanks, let me have a look at it
both can do that, i prefer adduser
are there any additional options I have to specify in order to do that? or will just saying "adduser username" do it all by default?
try to stick with non-gui apps which are available on most systems
yeah, that's what I do =) and even if I wanted to use the gui, I wouldnt be able to )
thanks, let me have a look at it
